mapper.select: select t1.YL_CARD, t1.`NAME`, t4.deal_result, (select IFNULL(sum(IFNULL(t10.MONEY,0)),0) from tool_deal_record_t t10 where t10.self_no = t1.SELF_NO and t10.YL_CARD=t1.YL_CARD AND t10.REIMB_TYPE='1101' and t10.reimb_date=#{today}) remib_total from tool_patient_t t1 left join tool_deal_result_t t4 on ( t1.yl_card = t4.yl_card and t1.name = t4.name ) where DATE_FORMAT(t4.deal_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{today}
